title: Leo Zodiac Hoodie
description: The sovereign flame. Leos are celestial royalty—born with the Sun's radiance coursing through their spirit, commanding attention without uttering a word. This hoodie channels divine confidence through sacred lion symbolism, wrapping natural-born leaders in cosmic armor that declares: 'I was made to shine, and the universe bows to my light.'
mysticalCopy: For kings and queens who don't wear crowns—they ARE the crown.
features: Premium heavyweight fleece for sovereign comfort
Celestial Leo lion insignia commanding center placement
Unisex oversized fit for bold self-expression
Cosmic fire energy woven into every thread
For those who lead with heart and rule with light
careInstructions: Machine wash cold inside out, tumble dry low. Your radiance never dims.
seoTitle: Leo Zodiac Hoodie | Celestial Fire Sign Apparel | Lyrīon Atelier
seoDescription: Channel your inner sovereign with the Leo Zodiac Hoodie. Premium unisex design for natural-born leaders ruled by the Sun's eternal flame.
